fps.Name: FPS
fps.Description:
UltraCam Beyond New FPS setting.
Let's you set to any FPS
WARNING: SET TO 120 FPS FOR UNCAPPED.
Recommended 30, 60 FPS caps for best FRAMETIMES.

menu fps.Name: Menu FPS
menu fps.Description: UltraCam Beyond NEW MENU FPS CAP. Set to your desire.

movie fps.Name: Movie FPS
movie fps.Description:
Should be set to 30 FPS, only touch if you desire to use 60 or 120FPS movie cap for a particular mod.
(WARNING) it will also auto lock to 30, 60 or 120 FPS.

fov.Name: FOV
fov.Description:
UltraCam Beyond NEW FOV setting, allows you to set FOV to anything
This now also scales up everything related to FOV.

time speed.Name: Time Speed
time speed.Description:
Increase or decrease time speed
istimeSlower bool acts as a decrease.

ani smoothing.Name: Sequence Smoothing
ani smoothing.Description: Animation Smoothing set to auto for now.

rsdbheap.Name: RSDB Heap size
rsdbheap.Description: Increase RSDB heap size, useful for merging romfs mods..

gametexturesheap.Name: Textures Heap size
gametexturesheap.Description:
(WARNING), don't touch unless you know what you are doing
Increase GameTextures heap size, useful for merging romfs mods..
SHOULD only be used with 8gb EXTENDED MEMORY LAYOUT

resolution.Name: Resolution
resolution.Description:
UltraCam Beyond NEW Resolution Scaling uses internal resolution
WARNING: ANYTHING OVER 1440P REQUIRES EXTENDED MEMORY

handheldwidth.Name: Handheld Width
handheldwidth.Description: UltraCam Beyond handheld resolution, set to AUTO.

handheldheight.Name: Handheld Width
handheldheight.Description: UltraCam Beyond handheld resolution, set to AUTO.

shadow resolution.Name: Shadow Resolution
shadow resolution.Description:
UltraCam Beyond NEW SHADOW resolution setting let's you set shadows up to 8K
WARNING: REQUIRES EXTENDED MEMORY LAYOUT FOR SHADOWS OVER 1536.

aspect ratio.Name: Aspect Ratio
aspect ratio.Description:
UltraCam Beyond ASPECT ratios. It now sets the aspect RATIOS internally
This is superior to any other AR patches As it will use internal resolution.

render distance.Name: Render Distance
render distance.Description:
UltraCam Beyond Render Distance.
Default is 25000. Increased is 50000.
May see a small benefit on low, up to 20% fps.
Expect the game to use fog like rendering Minecraft.

benchmark.Name: Benchmark Selection
benchmark.Description:
UltraCam Beyond preset default benchmark.
Trigger when you press G

freecam.Name: FreeCam
freecam.Description:
UltraCam Beyond Freecam! NEWLY IMPROVED FREECAM from 2.0
Turning this off will, not let you trigger freecam with controller.

handheldresolution.Name: Override Handheld Res
handheldresolution.Description: UltraCam Beyond overrides the resolution of handheld to docked.

hide ui.Name: Auto Hide UI in FreeCam
hide ui.Description: UltraCam Beyond AUTO Hide UI, this will automatically hide the UI in freecam mode.

quality improvements.Name: Quality Improvements
quality improvements.Description:
UltraCam Beyond Quality Improvements. This disables FXAA, FSR and Dynamic Resolution
WARNING: SHOULD ALWAYS BE TURNED ON WITH HIGH RESOLUTION

triple buffer.Name: Triple Buffer
triple buffer.Description:
UltraCam Triple Buffer.
WARNING: KEEP IT TURNED OFF ON SWITCH.

depthoffield.Name: Remove Depth Of Field
depthoffield.Description: UltraCam Beyond Remove Depth of Field.

fxaa.Name: Disable Fxaa
fxaa.Description: Removes FXAA from the game itself.

animationfadeout.Name: Last Keyframe Fadeout
animationfadeout.Description: Improves the smoothness of the last Keyframe for UltraCam sequencer.

slowtime.Name: Slow Time
slowtime.Description:
UltraCam Beyond SlowTime.
 This is controlled by a time scale.
